Set up Synapse and OAuth variables

Source: R/mod-synapse-oauth.R
dot-onLoad.Rd

Bring in the Synapse Python Client and set up global variables for OAuth at startup. Requires global variables initialized to NULL: synapse, app, api, scope, app_url, claims_param, authorization_url.

.onLoad(libname, pkgname)

Arguments

libname

default R .onLoad() parameter
pkgname

default R .onLoad() parameter

Contents

Developed by Kara Woo, Nicole Kauer, Kelsey Montgomery.
